Lino XL docs¶

Welcome to the Lino XL project homepage.

The Lino Extensions Library is a collection of plugins used by many Lino applications.

  • This repository is considered an integral part of the Lino framework, which is documented as a whole in the Lino Book.

  • Your feedback is welcome. Our community page explains how to contact us.

  • Changes to this particular repository are listed at http://xl.lino-framework.org/changes/
